column5: A very safe, quiet Plano home for up to two professional females, private, close to Shops at Legacy, the new Toyota campus, 75 Central and N. Dallas Tollway. Use of kitchen, laundry and rear parking available. LONG TERM GUESTS OK Beautiful POOL/SPA NO CLEANING FEES OR DEPOSIT REQUIRED. $ 29.00 I have a smaller bedroom available for 27.00 short term or weekend stays see Airbnb listing
